   20: 
   21: %%
   22: 
   23: -module(ssl_session_cache_api_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   26: 
   27: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   28: -include("tls_handshake.hrl").
   29: 
   30: %% Callback functions
   31: -export([all/0,
   32:         init_per_suite/1,
   33:          end_per_suite/1]).
   34: 
   35: %% Testcases
   36: -export([server_cb/0,
   37:          server_cb/1,
   38:          client_cb/0,
   39:          client_cb/1
   40:         ]).
   41: 
   42: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   43: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   44: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   45: all() ->
   46:     [server_cb,
   47:      client_cb].
   48: 
   49: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   50:     catch crypto:stop(),
   51:     try crypto:start() of
   52: 	ok ->
   53:             ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
   54:             Config0
   55:     catch _:_ ->
   56: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
   57:     end.
   58: 
   59: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   60:     ssl:stop(),
   61:     application:stop(crypto).
   62: 
   63: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   64: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
   65: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   66: server_cb() ->
   67:     [{doc, "Test ssl_session_cache_api server callback implementation"
   68:       "Note that default implementation is treated special to avoid"
   69:       "an extra process to handle the functional db structure used"
   70:       "The callback is provided for the main purpose of having a"
   71:       "session table that may survive node restart an assumes
   72:       a db reference that is not updated"
   73:      }].
   74: 
   75: server_cb(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   76:     Cb = ssl_server_session_cache_db,
   77:     Db0 = Cb:init([]),
   78:     Id0 = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(32),
   79:     DummySession0 = #session{session_id = Id0},
   80:     0 = Cb:size(Db0),
   81: 
   82:     Db1 = Cb:update(Db0, Id0, DummySession0),
   83:     1 = Cb:size(Db1),
   84: 
   85:     Id1 = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(32),
   86:     DummySession1 = #session{session_id = Id1},
   87:     Db2 = Cb:update(Db1, Id1, DummySession1),
   88:     2 = Cb:size(Db2),
   89: 
   90:     DummySession0 = Cb:lookup(Db2, Id0),
   91:     DummySession1 = Cb:lookup(Db2, Id1),
   92: 
   93:     Db3 = Cb:delete(Db2, Id1),
   94:     1 = Cb:size(Db3),
   95:     undefined = Cb:lookup(Db3, crypto:strong_rand_bytes(32)),
   96:     Cb:terminate(Db3).
   97: 
   98: client_cb() ->
   99:     [{doc, "Test ssl_session_cache_api client callback implementation"}].
  100: 
  101: client_cb(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  102:     Cb = ssl_client_session_cache_db,
  103:     Db = Cb:init([]),
  104:     Id0 = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(32),
  105:     DummySession0 = #session{session_id = Id0},
  106:     0 = Cb:size(Db),
  107: 
  108:     Cb:update(Db, Id0, DummySession0),
  109:     1 = Cb:size(Db),
  110: 
  111:     Id1 = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(32),
  112:     DummySession1 = #session{session_id = Id1},
  113:     Cb:update(Db, Id1, DummySession1),
  114:     2 = Cb:size(Db),
  115: 
  116:     DummySession0 = Cb:lookup(Db, Id0),
  117:     DummySession1 = Cb:lookup(Db, Id1),
  118:     undefined = Cb:lookup(Db, crypto:strong_rand_bytes(32)),
  119: 
  120:     Cb:delete(Db, Id1),
  121:     1 = Cb:size(Db),
  122:     Cb:terminate(Db).
